Apply flextable settings to match Brain journal requirements

Source: R/shared_flextable_settings.R
shared_flextable_settings.Rd

Apply flextable settings to match Brain journal requirements

Usage

shared_flextable_settings(x, padding = 0)

Arguments

x

a flextable::flextable

padding

controls padding.top and padding.bottom in flextable::padding()

Value

a modified flextable::flextable

Examples

head(iris) |> flextable::flextable() |> shared_flextable_settings()

Sepal.Length
Sepal.Width
Petal.Length
Petal.Width
